title: Military Lasik Giveaway...

content: We sure did GWG, and the military does do lasik surgery. So, why should anyone have to put up with this bogus lottery biz?
reply: We sure did GWG, and the military does do lasik surgery. So, why should anyone have to put up with this bogus lottery biz?
title: Military Lasik Giveaway...

content: Military only does LASIK if you have 18 months left on your contract (they don't count Stop Lossed time!), and are not within 90 days of deployment. Kind of hard to meet those standards in a line unit, since you're deployed one year, home one year, unless you're a careerist. Ah well, it's the careerists that deserve it anyways, not us one-term and out wonders.
reply: Military only does LASIK if you have 18 months left on your contract (they don't count Stop Lossed time!), and are not within 90 days of deployment.
